body_html: I will be splitting this PR into two sets of changes: One change set with the refactoring changes around the ExplicitShape() function I added to common_shape_fns.cc; and a second change set that adds a new AccumulateN-like op to contrib/framework.
body_text: I will be splitting this PR into two sets of changes: One change set with the refactoring changes around the ExplicitShape() function I added to common_shape_fns.cc; and a second change set that adds a new AccumulateN-like op to contrib/framework.
body: I will be splitting this PR into two sets of changes: One change set with the refactoring changes around the `ExplicitShape()` function I added to `common_shape_fns.cc`; and a second change set that adds a new `AccumulateN`-like op to `contrib/framework`.
